meta.title: CustomFieldPut - Models - API Reference
meta.description: The model for a PUT to update a custom field on a product.

blocks.data: The model for a PUT to update a custom field on a product.

allOf.description: Gets custom fields associated with a product. These allow you to specify additional information that will appear on the product's page, such as a book's ISBN or a DVD's release date.

name.description: The name of the field, shown on the storefront, orders, etc.

value.description: The name of the field, shown on the storefront, orders, etc.

id.description: The unique numeric ID of the custom field; increments sequentially.
